message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be extremely valuable to your portfolio. I'm asking for $950,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I am willing to offer $820,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. I think this is a fair offer considering the potential returns.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still seeking to keep my investment within my specified budget. I am willing to offer $850,000 for the product.
